abstract_ssm: The Brooklyn plumber business ledger is housed in a single bound volume and spans the period 1896 to 1900. The ledger lists the name and address of each client for whom work was performed, the type of work performed, the price of the work, and the date on which it was performed.
subject_ssm: Real property |z New York (State) |z Kings County
